sections.name: Abstract
sections.description: 1 paragraph describing the concrete plan, primary dataset/method, metrics, deliverables, and target output.

sections.name: Scope & Research Questions
sections.description: Goal statement (1-2 sentences) and 3-4 core research questions (specific, measurable)

sections.name: Primary Dataset / Corpus
sections.description: Specify the exact dataset to use. Optional validation sets for stress-tests only. Dataset is FIXED upfront - no scope creep.

sections.name: Milestones
sections.description: 4-5 milestones of 2 weeks each, totaling 8-12 weeks

sections.name: Appendices
sections.description: Excel columns, metrics definitions, file/folder layout

standardMilestones.title: Literature Review & Foundations
standardComponents: Core Reading List (12-15 papers with titles and years)
Excel columns: Paper Title, Year, Venue, Problem/Task, Dataset(s), Method Summary, Key Metrics, Key Results, Limitations, Relevance 1-5

standardMilestones.title: Dataset Collection & Implementation Setup
standardComponents: Deliverables: processed dataset, working baseline, evaluation scripts

standardMilestones.title: Manuscript Writing
standardMilestones.note: We will guide you for this when you come to this stage

principles: Every milestone has: Objectives, Concrete Steps, Deliverables, Acceptance Checks, Risks & Mitigations
Datasets are FIXED upfront - no scope creep
Ablation studies are enumerated explicitly (A1, A2, A3...)
Metrics are defined formally with mathematical notation
Durations are 8-12 weeks with 4-5 milestones of 2 weeks each
Suitable for execution by a single researcher
